name: hc_notifier
description: Run any hApp as a notifier agent

scripts.generate: hc s clean && echo "pass" | hc s -f=18929 --piped generate whosin.happ -a dcan17182 network -b https://signal.holo.host/ webrtc
scripts.start: pm2 start --name launch-happ "echo 'pass' | hc s -f=18929 --piped run 0 -p 17183"
scripts.restart: pm2 start --name launch-happ "echo 'pass' | hc s -f=18929 --piped run 0"
